title: Reuters reveals Google faces EU antitrust charges over its adtech business
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively reported that Alphabet unit Google could face European Union (EU) antitrust charges next year over its digital advertising […]

The post Reuters reveals Google faces EU antitrust charges over its adtech business appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported that Alphabet unit Google could face European Union (EU) antitrust charges next year over its digital advertising business, putting the company at risk of its fourth fine in the EU of more than a billion euros. Google’s ad business, which generated over $100 billion in sales last year, is Alphabet’s biggest moneymaker.

The post Reuters reveals Google faces EU antitrust charges over its adtech business appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
